评论详情: Cute sweater but fit more like a crop top and for that reason I returned it.  Material was nice though.

I am 5'4" tall; 111 pounds and normally wear an extra small. I ordered a small and it's so tight and short that it's getting returned. Color and design are wonderful, quality is good, but the sizing is really off. It sits above my belly button and is so tight that it shows the bra straps in back through the sweater. I would order a size up but this one took several weeks to arrive and I don't feel like waiting that long for another one, so I'm just returning it.
I loved
It is beautiful.  The material is perfect, but I ordered x-large and it fits me just right. It should be larger

Absolutely beautiful sweater. I like the red color. I like how soft it is. I like the tapered fit. The only thing that could be better is the way the last button lines up.

Color doesn’t look quite same. Slightly pinkish tint.
Retro girl approved! Quality and color is amazing! I always get compliments. Comfy and warm.
This sweater is so cute. I have had problems knowing what size to buy with this brand but think it is beautiful.
this is lovely. It feels and looks very ModCloth.
It goes with many outfits I have. It fits well and nice for indoor air conditioning rooms. I got compliments on it when I wore it at work.

I purchased to go with a couple strawberry wrap skirts I have and it works perfectly. It's enough for cool spring/summer nights. I have washed it and hung dry; it seemed to hold up just fine. I could've gone with a S, but the M works too.
I kept it but it looks a bit "old fashioned"

评论详情: Its made of high quality materials! However... I got the tight size, but don't like how it clings tightly to the chest, but is loose and baggy around the sides and waste. Also the buttons don't overlap enough in front to prevent gapping. I guess if you're smaller chested and not so curvy, this might work well. As for me, I'm returning it.

Did not like the fitting.

I ordered one size up and it is perfect, not too snug across chest. Sweater is beautifully made, quality fabric but much more of an orange peach color than cream/khaki. Flowers are embroidered which is a nice touch. I recommend if you don’t mind the color!

Sizing is generous, not like most items made in China.  I could have ordered a medium, though I’ll keep & wear the large. Next time though - medium for sure. The color is listed as khaki with green trim. The color, is just like the photo  - a true pale peach ice cream color. Very pretty, but by no means khaki.

I love this cardigan. It's super cute and goes with several outfits. It's well made and the fabric is thin enough that I can wear it on warmer days. I like the embroidered flowers which give it a retro feel. I do recommend it. I ordered my regular size and it fit great and has some stretch to it.
Buttons were very loose..pulled away from sweater. Button holes were stretched out of shape. Obviously used. Disappointed.

评论概述: Lovely sweater and perfect weight (thickness) off white
评论详情: Lovely sweater and perfect weight (thickness).  I gave it four stars because it is not what I would call white.  It's more of a creamy white.  Also, I feel the buttons could be more quality, like the sweater it's self.I am 5'5" 150 lbs 38 C and gathering from the other reviews I opted for size XL.  I believe it's more of a European sizing company.  If I had chosen a Large, I think it would have been too tight.  The XL gives me more of a relaxed fit (not baggy) when buttoned and not pulling in the chest.  Which is what I was looking for in a professional environment.  Hope this review helps!
Very cute. Buttonholes a little thin, but I dont button and unbutton cardigans too often once I put them on. Runs on the narrow/slim side.

Sweater is too small; there is no tag/label to indicate what the size is. The button holes do not hold their shape. The color is peach; not off white as expected. The sweater material is very soft and comfortable

评论概述: Nice Sweater But A Bit Thin
评论详情: This is a nice, stylish sweater, and the small fits perfectly, but the material is super thin.
Love the look and feel of this sweater. I have a pair of green pants that compliment the look. Looks adorable with jeans or a skirt.
Love the color and fabric. I received many compliments

Exactly as described and pictured - will look great with a plain pink dress or for retro 1940’s/1950’s outfits. ALL clothing that has buttons, has them sewn on by machine which frequently is slightly loose. The buttons on the sweater aren’t “too” loose, but I’m going to hand sew them to make them more secure before I wear it - I do this with 98% of clothes that I purchase - so it’s no reflection on this seller.
So well made. Runs true to size. Adorable.

评论概述: Beautiful color and pattern, definitely buy usual size unless...
评论详情: I absolutely adore this blouse. However, it is fits big since i got a size up (L), so do not buy one size bigger if you do not have a big chest (I'm a 36C with a torso length of 48cm nap to tail bone). The color is a beautiful peach color and it looks to be sewn well. I'm returning so I can buy my usual size.  I gave measurements to hopefully help anyone making a decision. I've also added photos showing what it looks like.
True to size. Fits perfectly. I've gotten so many compliments on this jacket. Love it
This is such a great quality and cute cardigan.  Perfect for transition from summer to fall.  I got so many compliments.  Definitely recommend.  True to size and super versatile.
I bought this cardigan and the white one with light green flowers, the cut/style/fit of this one is absolutely perfect & so adorable.  Great quality. Always get a compliment when I wear it.
I will cherish this sweater for a long time I only wish it was longer it goes to my waist

I love this sweater! The cherries are embroidered.  The material is light weight which is great for wearing something under it. Shipping was fast. I weigh 153 and I purchased a large which is not too tight but not too loose.  Perfect fit I think.
Great quality and SO soft!

评论概述: Pretty but only for a very narrow waist
评论详情: This is a very pretty sweater.  It does run small. I ordered a medium and usually fits into a small or medium depending on how the top is cut.  My shoulders are narrow, I am not busty, and my belly is not that big.  I could button the medium but there were gaps when I did.  I would go up at least one size even if you have no intention of buttoning it. I ended up returning the medium and re-ordering an XL.  It buttons and looks like it fits.
THE BUTTONS ARE FLIMSY, AND THE BUTTONHOLES ARE TOO LOOSE. WISH IT CAME IN A 3/4 SLEEVE.
I got so many compliments wearing this sweater but I will say one of the buttons came lose pretty quickly so be careful
Gorgeous sweater. Sized for children.
I just didn’t like the fit and material

This was that awkward length that was like too short to tuck in but too long to leave out. I wear everything high waisted so it just didn't work. The fabric is really nice and the hearts are kinda fuzzy! Absolutely adorable and completely true to the size chart fit great other than the awkward length issue

I purchase size Small and am 5’5, 130lbs. This fit perfectly. I also included a picture tucked into high waisted pants. Love this and plan to get more. Decent dupe for the Rouje Leora cardigan in this tan color with green edges. Feels thick and warm. Will update if I have issues with washing.
This sweater is good quality and goes well with other items I have purchased under this brand.

This cardigan is flattering and made very well. Buttons are a bit loose but i can tighten them. No big deal. I'm currently trying to lose weight and this sweater will still fit if I lose 40 lbs but not if I get bigger. I purchased this in a 2xl because that's what I get in woman's plus sometimes a 1xl in plus sizes. If you're a 3xl in plus sizes this is going to be too tight. It's got nice stretch to it and is a bit thicker than your regular cardigans  the material feels so good. I will be buying more. I want the one with hearts. Buy this,you won't be disappointed.

评论概述: Great fit, true to size and great feel .  Perfect for a 50s party.

This sweater is adorable, perfect for spring and I love it. It fits true to size, and since I am short--- it's not super short on me!
Beautiful, fancifully made, and exquisite piece. Would buy it again.
High quality! Super nice cloth with outstanding workmanship!

This L sweater is suitable for the petite built. 34-38C / 8-14 petite. The sleeves are longer and have to fold them (5 ft). The downsides - It rides up,- have to keep tugging sweater down, and the neckline yarn is becoming weak.

This sweater looks just as depicted in the images.  It's a light sweater but provides enough warmth for a chilly day.  Very cute and the feel of the fabric is soft not scratchy!  I also bought the pink one for my niece and she loved it.  The hem of the sweater hits just at the waist so it's worn more as a cropped sweater than one that goes to the hips for those who might be needing more coverage lower down.
really pretty, runs a bit smaller than expected.

It fits great and is super cute. Quality is good.

评论概述: Absolutely fabulous! Ordering one in mint today.

评论详情: This sweater is adorable! I ordered the purple and it’s just the right shade of lavender that goes with everything in stores this spring. The details are so cute with contrasting scallops at the placket and cuffs. There is also a diamond pattern knit into the body. Much classier than I expected! I deliberately ordered it too big because I did not want a cropped tight fit. I typically wear a medium and a medium would have given me the tighter cropped fit. I ordered again in different colors…can’t wait to get the black cherry one with red contrast stitching, (I hope It holds Up without pilling)

first, i have to say that this was is so so darling in person. however, i ended up returning it because it was just way too small. i normally wear a 2x but a 3x would have fit better. unfortunately, it doesn’t come in 3x.

I'm 5'2" about 170 large bust 30 in waist. Perfect vintage style the hearts are great 3d effect . This was fairly low cut without cami beneath I paired with the red skirt and was thrilled with the outfit. I can't wait for another chance to wear it

This sweater runs very big, I am a S in most things and this is huge. The sleeves are long and baggy, and it's overall just too big. I really wish there was an xs option. The material this cardigan was made from was light and comfortable. I have sensitive skin and it did not bother me. I am 5'4 with a comparatively long torso and it came down a little past my waist. The fit of the cardigan was accurate compared to the sizing chart. My only complaint was that the cherries were a little scant when it came to the use of string in the embroidery and this scantness (is this a word?) is not reflected in the pictures.
